name: .TRACE File Extension
summary: Learn about .TRACE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A TRACE file is a 3D object or animation project created in Traces, an early 3D modeling and animation application. It contains data used to render and animate a 3D object. TRACE files cannot be opened in programs other than Traces.

content: Before creating Blender, developer Ton Roosendaal created an early 3D modeling and animation application for Commodore's Amiga PCs. This application, named Traces, allowed users to render and animate basic 3D objects. Traces saved users' 3D objects and animations in TRACES files.

instructions: Unfortunately, Traces TRACE files are currently difficult to open. The only known way to open a TRACE file is by downloading Traces) and attempting to install the program on an Amiga emulator. Then, you can open your TRACE file with Traces.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
